oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John Mellencamp and Emmylou Harris At Bethel Woods Center for the Arts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bethel Woods Center for the Arts; Mellencamp, John, 1951-; Woodcuts (prints); Harris, Emmylou; Carter, Carlene;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color window card (yellow, purple, and pink on white) announcing John Mellencamp with Emmylou Harris and Carlene Carter on the Sad Clowns and Hillbillies Tour at the Bethel Woods Center For the Arts on July 7. Poster features woodcuts of a trailer and farmland.
